tramoseats class

Source: R/tramoseatsSingle.R
per_tramo.Rd

an R6 class that represents a tramoseats model

per_tramo(ts, template = c("RSAfull", "RSA0", "RSA1", "RSA2", "RSA3",
  "RSA4", "RSA5"), userdefined = NULL, ...)

Arguments

ts

a time series
template

passed as the spec argument to tramoseats_spec()
userdefined

passed as the userdefined argument to tramoseats()
...

passed to tramoseats_spec()

Inherits

persephone

Examples

data(AirPassengers, package = "datasets")

obj <- per_tramo(AirPassengers, "RSA3")
obj$run()
obj$ts
